scaledmarkets.dabl.docker

Class Docker

  • java.lang.Object
    • scaledmarkets.dabl.docker.Docker

  • public class Docker
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide access to a docker daemon. This is not a full docker client: it provides only the access that is needed by DABL.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ContainerPort
      Port to map to the containers that are created.
      static java.lang.String DefaultDockerURL
      Normally, this is a unix socket URL.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static Docker connect(java.lang.String dockerURL)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a Docker object for communicating with to a Docker daemon. This method does not actually communicate with the daemon. To test the connection, use the ping method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getContainers

        public DockerContainer[] getContainers(java.lang.String namePattern,
                                       java.lang.String label)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Obtain the containers with the specified name pattern or label. Pattern matching is done using the Java regex Pattern methods. Label may be a key name, or a key=value string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getImages

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getImages()
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Return a list, for which each element of the list represents an image, and is a list of the names of that image. See https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/v1.27/#operation/ImageList
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
